channel.title: Sunset & 42nd
channel.description: Sunset and 42nd is a Pop Culture, Broadway, and whatever else they want to talk about PodCast, brought to you by Clay and Stephen or Smartpenguin78 and Patronus as they are known on Broadway World. Every week they bring you opinions on the latest news and events important to them.
channel.copyright: All rights reserved by Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery. 2006.
channel.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
channel.itunes:summary: Sunset and 42nd is a Pop Culture, Broadway, and whatever else they want to talk about PodCast, brought to you by Clay and Stephen. Every week they bring you opinions on the latest broadway, hollywood and random news and events important to them.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Interested in some idiosyncratic rambling on random topics? This is the podcast for you.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: 2010 Oscars- Snoozy or Snazzy?
item.description: Clay & Katie put the West Wing repcaps on hold to discuss & debate the Oscar ceremony, & Clay continues to debase the great Meryl Streep, even as he tries to defend her.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Clay & Katie put the West Wing repcaps on hold to discuss & debate the Oscar ceremony, & Clay continues to debase the great Meryl Streep, even as he tries to defend her.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: The West Wing Season 3 recap & some rambling
item.description: Clay & Katie recap the Olympics so far, with much eye candy and awesomeness for all! They then launch into a full fledged recap of The West Wing season three with lots of back & forth on the value of Sam & the hotness of Amy.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Clay & Katie recap the Olympics so far, with much eye candy and awesomeness for all! They then launch into a full fledged recap of The West Wing season three with lots of back & forth on the value of Sam & the hotness of Amy.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: The West Wing Season 2 recap
item.description: In this very special all West Wing edition of Sunset & 42nd, Katie & Clay give a spoiler filled recap of The West Wing Season 2 (while also finishing up Season 1) and then discuss Isaac and Ishmael (the post Sept 11, 2001 "special event" episode. Engage the Wingnuts! cruciatus in crucem -- eas in crucem!
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: In this very special all West Wing edition of Sunset & 42nd, Katie & Clay give a spoiler filled recap of The West Wing Season 2 (while also finishing up Season 1) and then discuss Isaac and Ishmael (the post Sept 11, 2001 "special event" episode. Engage the Wingnuts! cruciatus in crucem -- eas in crucem!

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: 2010 Oscar & Olympic preview
item.description: Katie & Clay recap the boring Super Bowl & preview the upcoming Winter Olympics & Oscars. We also touch on celebrity scandals & other shenanigans.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Katie & Clay recap the boring Super Bowl & preview the upcoming Winter Olympics & Oscars. We also touch on celebrity scandals & other shenanigans.

item.title: Sunset & 42: Golden Globe snorefest... Macgruber?
item.description: Katie and Clay recap the highlights of the Golden Globes, all 2 of them. Then the discussion takes on other insane topics such as creating our own awards show, the Macgruber movie and the Batman franchise. The meat of the show though goes to the character by character assessment of The West Wing, as determined midway through season one, if you watched the show you may really want to check this one out.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Katie and Clay recap the highlights of the Golden Globes, all 2 of them. Then the discussion takes on other insane topics such as creating our own awards show, the Macgruber movie and the Batman franchise. The meat of the show though goes to the character by character assessment of The West Wing, as determined midway through season one, if you watched the show you may really want to check this one out.

item.title: Sunset & 42: Barney, Conan, Chuck & Coalhouse Suit Up!
item.description: Katie & Clay wax on, and on about episode 100 of How I Met Your Mother, the Conan/Leno debacle, Bradley Whitford's porn stache, and more topics. Clay also gives Katie the run down on Chuck and the, now closed, Ragtime revival, while Katie revels in her Snuggie. Listen. Or don't, you know, if that's not your thing and all... but then, why are you here?
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Katie & Clay wax on, and on about episode 100 of How I Met Your Mother, the Conan/Leno debacle, Bradley Whitford's porn stache, and more topics. Clay also gives Katie the run down on Chuck and the, now closed, Ragtime revival, while Katie revels in her Snuggie. Listen. Or don't, you know, if that's not your thing and all... but then, why are you here?

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Golden Glee Galore
item.description: Katie & Clay return for another sans Stephen episode. We touch on the Golden Globe nominations and a Glee marathon of goodness. Then Katie convinces Clay to finally watch the West Wing, destroying all doubts.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Katie & Clay return for another sans Stephen episode. We touch on the Golden Globe nominations and a Glee marathon of goodness. Then Katie convinces Clay to finally watch the West Wing, destroying all doubts.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Version 2.0
item.description: Clay and Katie team up to restart the Sunset & 42ns rants and rambles. On this podcast they discuss the Martin/Baldwin Oscar hosting, the Ragtime revival on Broadway, and a rundown of the current TV season. Glee discussion gets intense, Dr. Horrrible is revisited, and someone almost gets kicked in the face!
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Clay and Katie team up to restart the Sunset & 42ns rants and rambles. On this podcast they discuss the Martin/Baldwin Oscar hosting, the Ragtime revival on Broadway, and a rundown of the current TV season. Glee discussion gets intense, Dr. Horrrible is revisited, and someone almost gets kicked in the face!

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep. 61- The Dark Knight Re-rambles
item.description: Clay & Stephen chat extensively about the Dark Knight, say goodbye to Estelle Getty, wax on Neil Patrick Harris, and also give some updates on casting of Godspell, stalker rabbits, and the Moroccan flag.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Clay & Stephen chat extensively about the Dark Knight, say goodbye to Estelle Getty, wax on Neil Patrick Harris, and also give some updates on casting of Godspell, stalker rabbits, and the Moroccan flag.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep.60- Movie watching goodness!
item.description: Stephen & Clay chat it up and give their takes on a plethora of film goodies such as The Eye, The Savages, Star Trek, and several others. Clay & Sara also give a quick recap and review of Wall-E. Tangents, distractions and all your favorite weirdness abounds.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Stephen & Clay chat it up and give their takes on a plethora of film goodies such as The Eye, The Savages, Star Trek, and several others. Clay & Sara also give a quick recap and review of Wall-E. Tangents, distractions and all your favorite weirdness abounds.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep.59- Return to form with Tony wrap!
item.description: Clay & Stephen team up once again to ramble on about life, dismantle Broadway royalty, honor Sondheim worship, and engage the very best & oddest people and players in pop-culture.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Clay & Stephen team up once again to ramble on about life, dismantle Broadway royalty, honor Sondheim worship, and engage the very best & oddest people and players in pop-culture.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep. 58- 2008 Tony Preview
item.description: Sara and Clay preview the 2008 Tony Awards, complete with descriptions and predictions of all the contenders and pretenders.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Sara and Clay preview the 2008 Tony Awards, complete with descriptions and predictions of all the contenders and pretenders.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Season 3, Episode 1 (Ep. 57)
item.description: Stephen & Clay are back from Holiday Hiatus to tackle some biting topics of intense interest, and even argue a bit with each other. Topics include: Sweeney Todd (tour and film), Juno, the Razzies, the Oscars, and much more!
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Stephen & Clay are back from Holiday Hiatus to tackle some biting topics of intense interest, and even argue a bit with each other. Topics include: Sweeney Todd (tour and film), Juno, the Razzies, the Oscars, and much more!

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep.56- Seattle Cafe is no more!
item.description:
Stephen and Clay return to generally ramble on about the usual topics: Broadway, tv, sports, movies, and our general lives. Plus we bid a fond adieu to the Seattle Cafe, birthplace of S42.
This is the first episode we have done on the Blog Talk Radio system please go to http://www.blogtalkradio.com/sunsetand42nd to check it out. We will be using this system to do live call in shows, so be on the lookout!
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary:
Stephen and Clay return to generally ramble on about the usual topics: Broadway, tv, sports, movies, and our general lives. Plus we bid a fond adieu to the Seattle Cafe, birthplace of S42.
This is the first episode we have done on the Blog Talk Radio system please go to http://www.blogtalkradio.com/sunsetand42nd to check it out. We will be using this system to do live call in shows, so be on the lookout!

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep. 55- Heores still sucks!
item.description: Clay & Stephen are still stuck on the crapfest that is this season of Heroes. They also touch on such subjects as the return of Caplan, names of sports teams, the casting of Sunday in the Park with George, and much more.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Clay & Stephen are still stuck on the crapfest that is this season of Heroes. They also touch on such subjects as the return of Caplan, names of sports teams, the casting of Sunday in the Park with George, and much more.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep. 54- Phantom Plus Some
item.description: Stephen and Clay talk of horrors, such horrible horrors that are Phantom, Sagat/Aiken and Heroes. Also discussed are Pushing Daisies, How I Met Your Mother, Kid Nation and many other things.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Stephen and Clay talk of horrors, such horrible horrors that are Phantom, Sagat/Aiken and Heroes. Also discussed are Pushing Daisies, How I Met Your Mother, Kid Nation and many other things.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep. 53- Lone Love Life
item.description: Stephen and Clay bring the horrible news about the lack of Love on Broadway, the return of Life, and lots of TV reviews. We also have Sara & Clay for Couple Chat, and replay "Love For Sale" performed by John Raymond Barker.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Stephen and Clay bring the horrible news about the lack of Love on Broadway, the return of Life, and lots of TV reviews. We also have Sara & Clay for Couple Chat, and replay "Love For Sale" performed by John Raymond Barker.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep.52- Dropin' the F-Bomb on the TV Season
item.description: Stephen and Clay discuss the Fall TV season in depth, review Curtains and A Chorus Line, and earn the show's explicit rating most certainly.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Stephen and Clay discuss the Fall TV season in depth, review Curtains and A Chorus Line, and earn the show's explicit rating most certainly.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep 51 - Dynas and Dallasy
item.description: The talking about upcoming stuff show
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: The talking about upcoming stuff show

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep. 50- Longhorn & 42nd
item.description: Stephen and Clay bring you a return to the classic days of S42, tune in for: Broadway News, Sweeney Todd talk, rambling, movie talk, tv-talk, and RANTS galore, plus much more!
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Stephen and Clay bring you a return to the classic days of S42, tune in for: Broadway News, Sweeney Todd talk, rambling, movie talk, tv-talk, and RANTS galore, plus much more!

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep. 49- Return of the Kitz
item.description: Katie from Kansas (Kitzarina) returns as co-host for she and Clay to elaborate on The Little Mermaid casting, other randomness and mucho Harry Potter talk, some spoilers included.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Katie from Kansas (Kitzarina) returns as co-host for she and Clay to elaborate on The Little Mermaid casting, other randomness and mucho Harry Potter talk, some spoilers included.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep. 48- Order of the Crap
item.description:
Stephen and Clay return to the show and bring the usual rambles and nonsense, with some talk about the impending move and teasers on Harry Potter and Send Us Your Crap.
Clay will be bringing you the show with some special guests the next few weeks, and we hope to return to Broadway chat once the season gets rolling.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary:
Stephen and Clay return to the show and bring the usual rambles and nonsense, with some talk about the impending move and teasers on Harry Potter and Send Us Your Crap.
Clay will be bringing you the show with some special guests the next few weeks, and we hope to return to Broadway chat once the season gets rolling.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep 47 - Crap
item.description: Crap.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: Crap.

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep.46- Silly Season
item.description: The uneventful summer season of Broadway's lack of news continues, and we all seem a little stir crazy... because it is HOT in NYC!
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: The uneventful summer season of Broadway's lack of news continues, and we all seem a little stir crazy... because it is HOT in NYC!

item.title: Sunset & 42nd: Ep.45- Hatemusik
item.description: We return to wrap up the Tonys, give a long and scathing review of LoveMusik, and to generally ramble it up.
item.itunes:author: Stephen Webb and Clay Dockery
item.itunes:summary: We return to wrap up the Tonys, give a long and scathing review of LoveMusik, and to generally ramble it up.
